title: Input
description: Takes in a byte array of SBOR byte and attempts to decode it to a [`Value`]. Since some of the types in the [`Value`] model are network aware, this request also takes in a network id which is primarily used for the Bech32m encoding of addresses.

encoded_value.description: A byte array serialized as a hex string of the SBOR buffer to attempt to decode as a [`Value`]

network_id.description: An 8 bit unsigned integer serialized as a string which represents the id of the network that the decoded data will be used on. This is primarily used for the Bech32m encoding of addresses.
